item.title: Thai Curry Soup
item.description: Facts Source: Emma; Total Time: 30 minutes Ingredients 0.25 cups basil 2 tbsp brown suger 1.5 pounds chicken 6 cups chicken broth 0.5 cups cilantro 14 ounces coconut milk 1 diced onion 1 tbsp fish sauce 1 tbsp ginger 2 tbsp lime juice 1 tbsp minced garlic 1 tbsp olive oil some pepper 1 red bell pepper 3 tbsp red curry paste 8 ounces rice noodles some salt 3 sliced green onions Cookware large pot Steps Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
